chapter.title: Overview of Features

introduction.p: This chapter is a high-level view of the important concepts, features and design decisions that go into the creation of MathBook XML. For careful exact descriptions of details, we will direct you to one of the many sections in the chapter. So this chapter should make you aware of what is possible and expand on the philosophy described earlier in , while also giving you examples of many basic constructions you can use to get started quickly.
